00170 typedef enum
00171 {
00172     CSL_MEM_DARAM,    /* Memory type is DARAM */
00173     CSL_MEM_SARAM,    /* Memory type is SARAM */
00174     CSL_MEM_INVALID   /* Invalid Memory type  */
00175 } CSL_MemType;

00182 typedef enum

00185     CSL_MEM_MSDARAM_CLOCK_OFF    /* MSDARAM clock will be set to OFF */
